title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.5 - Content of official statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 27.5 - Content of official statement

State Regulations

The official statement shall contain a cover page, a table
of contents, where appropriate a copy of the notice of sale, any appendices
which may be included therein and at least the following categories of
information: (a) description of the
issue; (b) description of the
issuer; (c) financial
information; (d) description of
debt structure; and
(e) legal
matters. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
27.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
